title: (x) Indiana Jones movie logos - SF Fedora, Adventure {Ignacio, Bob Evans}
content:
Could someone let me know what typeface is used for the Indian Jones movies.

Thank you,

doug

 [‹ (x) squarish tech sans "M2 hus i Norsjælland" - Fishmonger {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043304/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32298 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Café Paradiso 70s geometric sans - ITC Busorama {Rainer, Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043304/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32302 "Go to next forum topic")
author: df234

comments.content: Freeware clones are SF Fedora and Adventure -
